titulo: La Pesca: An 8 Year Old Boy Telling, in His Newly Learned Spanish Language, About His Love of Salmon Fishing. (Spanish Edition)
descripcion:
This audiobook features an eight-year-old boy telling, in his newly learned Spanish, about his love of salmon fishing. This is A FLY Young Author Book.Â 
Advanced students have the opportunity to write a story in their new target language and become a published FLY Young Author.
